DEMO_116_MSG_040:
́What in tarnation!? What the heck was that, ȁ!? Is everything alright?
ā
DEMO_116_MSG_050:

But that person in the record... was that also you?
DEMO_116_MSG_060:
́Ah, so you've got no memories of yer past. Then I'm goin' out on a limb here and guessin' that was you, but from the past!
ā
DEMO_116_MSG_070:

off an' fight a REALLY strong opponent.
DEMO_116_MSG_080: ́Ah, crap! We let ourselves get distracted. We gotta get up there an' stop the machine from causin' all that dang turbulence.
